column4: will someone help me set up sharing between ubuntu in virtual box and windows7?
you can use samba for this.
if you install the "samba" and "system-config-samba" package you can set up a share on your Ubuntu Host that Windows 7 can see in My Network Places
once the packages are installed, you can edit the samba configuration through the item it adds to, either, System or Preferences in the main menu
